thread.title: Confirmation Battles Await Donald Trump’s Nominees

author: John D. McKinnon
title: Confirmation Battles Await Donald Trump’s Nominees
text:
WASHINGTON—Confirmation battles loom for President Donald Trump’s nominees to run the State Department and the Central Intelligence Agency, complicating the administration’s foreign-policy efforts ahead of important decisions regarding North Korea and Iran.
Sen. Rand Paul (R., Ky.) told CNN on Sunday that he would try to filibuster Mr. Trump’s choices of Mike Pompeo to be secretary of state and Gina Haspel, now the CIA’s deputy director, to take Mr. Pompeo’s current slot as CIA director. Mr. Paul had said previously that... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
